title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to Utilization Review

Agents conducting Utilization Review for purposes of determining health care
coverage for any treatment or service for a Mental Health Condition in
accordance with Article 49 of the Insurance Law or Article 49 of the Public

Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
514.3

Adopted

New

York State Register May 15, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/15/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
